scripts.lib: npm run lib:html && npm run lib:store && npm run lib:element && npm run lib:route
scripts.lib:html: cd lib/kutimo-html && npm i && npm run build
scripts.lib:route: cd lib/kutimo-route && npm i && npm run build
scripts.lib:store: cd lib/kutimo-store && npm i && npm run build
scripts.lib:element: cd lib/kutimo-element && npm i && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run lib && npm i && rollup --config && tsc -d --emitDeclarationOnly --declarationDir build/types
scripts.example: npm run lib && npm run build && cd ./example && npm i && npm start
